    • Class org.openimaj.image.DisplayUtilities.ImageComponent extends JComponent implements Serializable

      serialVersionUID:
      1L

      • Serialized Fields

        • image

          BufferedImage image
          The image being displayed

        • originalImage

          Image<Q,I extends Image<Q,I>> originalImage
          The original image being displayed. Used for pixel interrogation

        • autoResize

          boolean autoResize
          Whether to auto resize the component to the content size

        • autoPack

          boolean autoPack
          Whether to pack the component on resize

        • autoFit

          boolean autoFit
          Whether to size the image to fit within the component's given size

        • keepAspect

          boolean keepAspect
          When using autoFit, whether to keep the aspect ratio constant

        • drawTransparencyGrid

          boolean drawTransparencyGrid
          Draw a grid where there is no image

        • drawPixelColour

          boolean drawPixelColour
          Whether to draw the mouse over pixel colour on the next paint

        • showPixelColours

          boolean showPixelColours
          Whether to show pixel colours on mouse over

        • showXY

          boolean showXY
          Whether to show the XY coordinate of the mouse

        • allowZooming

          boolean allowZooming
          Whether to allow zooming

        • allowDragging

          boolean allowDragging
          Whether to allow dragging

        • drawX

          double drawX
          Gives the image-coord point in the centre of the image

        • drawY

          double drawY
          Gives the image-coord point in the centre of the image

        • scaleFactorX

          double scaleFactorX
          Gives the image scale

        • scaleFactorY

          double scaleFactorY
          Gives the image scale

        • dragStartX

          int dragStartX
          The last location of the drag - x-coordinate

        • dragStartY

          int dragStartY
          The last location of the drag - y-coordinate

        • pixelX

          int pixelX
          The x-coordinate of the pixel being displayed

        • pixelY

          int pixelY
          The y-coordinate of the pixel being displayed

        • mouseX

          int mouseX
          The current mouse coordinate

        • mouseY

          int mouseY
          The current mouse coordinate

        • currentPixelColour

          Float[] currentPixelColour
          The current pixel colour

        • listeners

          ArrayList<E> listeners
          List of listeners

        • displayedImage

          BufferedImage displayedImage
          The last displayed image
